data.title: Advanced Clean Transportation (ACT) Expo
data.meta_description: Join us at the Advanced Clean Transportation (ACT) Expo, North America’s largest fleet technology event.
data.text:
ACT Expo 2025 Looking for Dynamic Speakers, Presentations

— As our return to Anaheim begins, we are opening our annual call for abstracts. Be a part of the largest gathering of clean tech industry stakeholders at ACT Expo 2025.

ACT Shipper-Carrier Connect: Partnerships Needed for Sustainability

— This year’s inaugural ACT Shipper-Carrier Connect united and educated shippers, logistics partners, and solution providers on the crucial role of partnerships to achieve shared goals for economic and environmental sustainability.

JB Hunt President: Misalignment Between Tech, Policies and Economics

— For the industry to reach its overarching goal of reducing transportation-related emissions, something needs to change according to Shelley Simpson, president of J.B. Hunt Transport Services.

Ryder CEO: EV Tech Needs Inflection Point to Work in Commercial Transport

— During his keynote address at this year’s ACT Expo in Las Vegas, Sanchez did not pull any punches on how he sees electric trucks fitting into his fleet.

ZM Trucks Makes its Debut at ACT Expo

— ZM Trucks, the latest zero-emissions commercial truck brand to hit the market, announces five models to the North American market before the end of 2024.

Zeem Solutions Brings Electric Trucks, EV Charging to New Jersey Port

— Zeem Solutions announces the development of an electric truck mega-depot near Port Newark, New Jersey, which will serve regional fleet operators with electric trucks, overnight parking, and additional charging during the day.

Mack 2024 MD Electric, Mack LR Electric Models Now Eligible for HVIP

— Mack Trucks announces that its 2024 Model Year Mack MD Electric and LR Electric models now qualify for the California Air Resources Board (CARB) Clean Truck and Bus Voucher Incentive Project (HVIP).

REE Automotive Delivers Full By-Wire P7-C EV to Penske Truck Leasing

— REE Automotive recently delivered their P7-C electric truck to Penske Truck Leasing, which will be used as a demo to customers interested in electrifying their fleets.

Hyundai Motor Company Shares Hydrogen Vision, U.S. Clean Logistics Business

— Hyundai Motor Company shares its hydrogen vision on the ACT Expo show floor, introducing its U.S. clean logistics business powered by the company’s Class 8 XCIENT Fuel Cell electric truck.

WattEV to Expand Fleet of HD Electric Trucks

— Truck-as-a-Service solution provider WattEV announces that it is increasing its current fleet of 36 battery-electric trucks to more than 180 by the end of 2024.

Accelera Launches Next-Gen Hydrogen, Electric Solutions

— Accelera by Cummins launches its next generation versions of its hydrogen fuel cell engines, a high efficiency eAxle, and its next-generation batteries at ACT Expo 2024.
